name: Flyting Fantasy - 5/10 Minute Prototype Demo
description:
I'd really appreciate some feedback on this prototype. 

Flyting is the form of rhyming, like a medival rap battle if you will. This is a traditional style RPG, where the turn based combat is replaced with Flyting. 

Everything in this prototype is placeholder, default tilesets etc, its very messy. Im using RPG Maker which has its own limitations also, but really helps with the traditional RPG feeling. 

I'm really hoping to get feedback on the gameplay concept, mainly do you think this would get hold after a few hours, no matter how good the story may get?
